page.title: 06CLUBS
page.content:
Clubs in and around Barnsley are in various groups.Children go to craft and outdoor clubs as well as Brownies and Cubs.Young people go to youth clubs, Guides and Scouts.
Women choose mostly crafts and guilds, as they like organising meetings and rallies. Some women go to keep fit and dancing clubs. There are a lot of Mother and Toddler groups and slimming clubs.
There are not many clubs for men. They like engineering and sports clubs.
Old people have craft and painting clubs and many go to the Darby and Joan Club.
There are more clubs for young people than for adults.
